Actions.Name: Swindle
Actions.Description: Swap places with a character in range 3, teleporting. Foes can save to avoid this effect.

Actions.Name: Incentivize
Actions.Description: The broker puts down a valuables token in range 3.

Actions.Name: Exact Price
Effects: A foe in range 6 becomes stunned and pacified. A foe can avoid this by taking divine damage equal to 25% of their max hp or by dropping a valuables token.
Only recharges if the Broker picks up a valuables token.

Actions.Name: Tit for Tat
Actions.Description: The Broker marks an ally in range 4. While marked, that character has counter and evasion.
